abstract: Beck's beer maker Anheuser-Busch InBev agrees to $20 million settlement in class-action lawsuit over deceptive labeling of beer as German.
lead_paragraph: Drinkers of Beck’s beer in the United States who thought the American-made brew they were buying was still a century-old German import can get cash payments under a $20 million settlement approved on Tuesday.

headline.main: Beck’s Beer Offers Buyers Cash to Settle Suit Over Packaging
headline.print_headline: Beck’s Beer Offers Buyers Cash to Settle Suit Over Packaging

snippet: Drinkers of Beck’s beer in the United States who thought the American-made brew they were buying was still a century-old German import can get cash payments under a $20 million settlement approved on Tuesday.
